email.firstSetupHeader: Connect your Gmail account and Lily will show her true power.
email.firstSetupText: Share your email conversations with colleagues, so your organization will be able to respond based on a complete history of communication.
email.noFolders: You don't have any template folders. Create one to organize your templates.
email.noTemplates: You don't have any email templates right now. Create one to make emailing your customers faster and easier.
email.accountShare: Give specific colleagues additional permissions to access your email.
email.emailMetadata: The content of this email is not visible to you because the owner has chosen not to share the full message.
